trans-unit.source: Sets or clears the color- and grayscale-adjustment matrices for a specified category

seg-source.mrk: Sets or clears the color- and grayscale-adjustment matrices for a specified category

target.mrk: Sets or clears the color- and grayscale-adjustment matrices for a specified category

trans-unit.source: Parameters
Pointer to an ImageAttribute object
[optional] The category for which the color- and grayscale-adjustment matrices are set or cleared:

seg-source.mrk: The category for which the color- and grayscale-adjustment matrices are set or cleared:

target.mrk: The category for which the color- and grayscale-adjustment matrices are set or cleared:

trans-unit.source: 0 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own

seg-source.mrk: 0 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own

target.mrk: 0 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to all categories that do not have adjustment settings of their own

trans-unit.source: 1 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to bitmapped images

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to bitmapped images

target.mrk: 1 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to bitmapped images

trans-unit.source: 2 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to brush operations in metafiles

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to brush operations in metafiles

target.mrk: 2 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to brush operations in metafiles

trans-unit.source: 3 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to pen operations in metafiles

seg-source.mrk: 3 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to pen operations in metafiles

target.mrk: 3 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to pen operations in metafiles

trans-unit.source: 4 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to text drawn in metafiles

seg-source.mrk: 4 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to text drawn in metafiles

target.mrk: 4 - Color or grayscale adjustment applies to text drawn in metafiles

trans-unit.source: [optional] If True, the specified matrices (color, grayscale or both) adjustments for the specified

seg-source.mrk: If True, the specified matrices (color, grayscale or both) adjustments for the specified

target.mrk: If True, the specified matrices (color, grayscale or both) adjustments for the specified

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagGDIPCOLORMATRIX structure that specifies a color-adjustment matrix

seg-source.mrk: $tagGDIPCOLORMATRIX structure that specifies a color-adjustment matrix

target.mrk: $tagGDIPCOLORMATRIX structure that specifies a color-adjustment matrix

trans-unit.source: [optional] $tagGDIPCOLORMATRIX structure that specifies a grayscale-adjustment matrix

seg-source.mrk: $tagGDIPCOLORMATRIX structure that specifies a grayscale-adjustment matrix

target.mrk: $tagGDIPCOLORMATRIX structure that specifies a grayscale-adjustment matrix

trans-unit.source: [optional] Type of image and color that will be affected by the adjustment matrices:

seg-source.mrk: Type of image and color that will be affected by the adjustment matrices:

target.mrk: Type of image and color that will be affected by the adjustment matrices:

trans-unit.source: 0 - All color values (including grays) are adjusted by the same color-adjustment matrix

seg-source.mrk: 0 - All color values (including grays) are adjusted by the same color-adjustment matrix

target.mrk: 0 - All color values (including grays) are adjusted by the same color-adjustment matrix

trans-unit.source: 1 - Colors are adjusted but gray shades are not adjusted.

seg-source.mrk: 1 - Colors are adjusted but gray shades are not adjusted.

target.mrk: 1 - Colors are adjusted but gray shades are not adjusted.

trans-unit.source: 2 - Colors are adjusted by one matrix and gray shades are adjusted by another matrix

seg-source.mrk: 2 - Colors are adjusted by one matrix and gray shades are adjusted by another matrix

target.mrk: 2 - Colors are adjusted by one matrix and gray shades are adjusted by another matrix

trans-unit.source: Return Value
True.
False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

seg-source.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).

target.mrk: False and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended may contain GPSTATUS error code ($GPID_ERR*).
